title: ProposalIQ
description:
ProposalIQ is reimagined as an AI-driven proposal builder for freelancers and agencies. Built from the ground up with early user insights, it combines a context-aware AI engine that adapts to your industry’s language, real-time team collaboration, and actionable client analytics to reveal what truly wins approvals.

Customize workflows like automated follow-ups or one-click client acceptances while leveraging a scalable architecture primed for user-driven AI expansions.
